meanings.sent1: The bunny was the tamest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The cat was the tamest pet in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The tamest squirrel in the park loved to collect acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the tamest melody in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The tamest flower in the garden bloomed with delicate beauty.

meanings.definition: Showing the most restraint or control
meanings.sent1: He had the tamest reaction to the surprising news.
meanings.sent2: She showed the tamest behavior during the argument.
meanings.sent3: The tamest student in the class never missed a homework assignment.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the tamest mask for his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The tamest river flowed gently through the valley.
